title: Need your help in transitioning my 520 set to all off backs UPDATED LIST
author: Scott L.

posts.post_title: Need your help in transitioning my 520 set to all off backs UPDATED LIST
posts.post_content:
I’m presently trying to swap out my Piedmont and Sweet Cap backs for Sovereign or better off backs. Below is a list of the cards I still need. In most cases I can include a P or SC version of the card in any deal or purchase outright. My set is graded so preference for graded but raw good as well. PSA/SGC only. 

Sweet spot is 2.5 to 4.5 but anything with nice eye appeal works. I personally don’t do Authentics or really off condition cards. 

Would sincerely appreciate any help you might be able to provide me towards my goal. 

PM, email or posts in this thread all work. 

Thanks. Scott

UPDATED 5/15/22
